website_summaries.verdict: Though you may want to consider a unit with more BTU output for larger areas, this reliable, reasonably-priced model is worth considering if budget is your top concern.
pros: Slide-out chassis and low price make it practical for most consumers
Some users report lower utility bills
cons: Some reports of faulty compressors upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Reliable workhorse that many of my company's industrial customers request ...
customer_reviews.text: Reliable workhorse that many of my company's industrial customers request based on reputation. However, we have run into 4 units recently that have sheet metal screws driven too deeply on the backside, right into the coils, which will require a warranty service call as we didn't notice until after the Amazon return window had closed. Open up the unit and check for that manufacturing defect right away.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This unit looked just right, but after only 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit looked just right, but after only 1 year of use, the heating function won't work at all. When I contacted Frigidaire, they provided me with a different warranty that specified a 1-year rather than a 2-year warranty. Frigidaire tried to pass this off as my warranty, but I found my original warranty. I explained all this in subsequent phone calls, but the outcome is that Frigidaire is not going to honor my 2-year warranty which I got when I bought my unit. I will never buy another Frigidaire product. Additionally, I paid nearly $700.00 for an appliance that only worked 18 months, and Frigidaire thinks that is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Dunbar Green

customer_reviews.title: Heater is not operational, rapaired once and broke again.
customer_reviews.text: Just scheduled 4th service call in two months since ownership. Heater BARELY or does not work. Previous tech had to replace the heating element, control board and reattach fan in back that fell off. Not the heater is barely working again after only 4 days. Frigidaire keeps sending out techs to repair and it has only been functionsl for 4 days of the first two months of ownership. Wolu like a refund and return, but they will not allow this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery service screwed up......Amazon saved the day!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had more expensive AC units before that didn't cool half as good as this one. Heater is very powerful and heats the whole house in minutes. Great product. Awesome service and warranty plan. When this product arrived it was damaged by the delivery service and Amazon jumped through hoops to make it right in under an hour. I will be an Amazon Prime customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Britton Jacquelyn Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So quiet unlike many units! It really cools our 250 sq ft Florida room. we added the room by converting our existing deck into a fully enclosed many windowed room. We did not want to run heat and air ducts so bought this unit to both cool and warm that room.Since we live in Florida, we use the room all year. It gets hot here in the summer so we needed a stout AC unit and this filled the bill! It does not get really cold here more than a few days out of the year so the heat function does come in handy too! Love the remote control and all the options!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great unit...easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was concerned about the heating capabilities of this unit. But, after we finished the walls (R19) and ceiling (R38) the unit was able to heat the 24ftx30ft (10ft H) shop area just fine (in 25-30dgs outside temps (Western MI). It's not a blast of hot air, but more like a steady (room filling) output of warm air that brings the shop to a very comfortable 60dgs in about 30 minutes...tops! I'm looking forward to testing the AC function this summer. I'm sure it will be more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of cool, heat and fan.
customer_reviews.text: During our recent cold fronts here in south Florida this unit (which I installed in my bedroom) kept our whole house warm and comfortable. (The cool option does the same the other way around) The remote control is not the best as you have to keep clicking it to get it to work at times.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Linck

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Heater works well. Auto temp is handy. It will be a/c season here in Louisiana soon. So we will see what shes made of. Edit 9/27/2016: One Louisiana summer down. Unit kept up nicely. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Will Edward Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The best a/c heater invented *NOTE*
customer_reviews.text: I love having these units in my house, which I have 2. They work great, and not having to take the a/c in and out of the window during certain times of the year (heat needed at night, a/c during afternoons) is really great. They cool my house perfectly during the summer, and keep it warm during the winter. @ the bottom, you will see a gap where the casing is. DO NOT COVER that gap. It will cause the copper (or brass??) pipes to freeze, and ice to accumulate on the back side when using the heater. It needs to stay open. I found this out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Mandel

customer_reviews.title: Open box when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Was going to go in my she shed, but it sat in box waiting for people to deliver she shed and that took them an extra month. When ready to install opened box and unit was damaged, ugh!! Box was fine on outside but inside was damaged. Learned a lesson always open box when you receive something and check item. Now dealing with square trade.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Ease and Value
customer_reviews.text: Leave it to Amazon to not only be competitive on price, but deliver for free! This is a very large item, so it was awesome getting home to find it delivered to our front door. The AC is a great value, quote and efficient. Very easy to install as well!
customer_reviews.author: April & Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an older home that has central air, but the back room has low ceilings and only enough space for small duct work pipes. Getting this unit was much cheaper option than having a mini-split system installed. I couldn't be happier with it! It works great in heat mode and air conditioning, and doesn't run the electric bill through the roof. I would definitely buy it again! The only negative, the condensation collected in air conditioning mode doesn't drain well. It doesn't affect the performance, but I can hear the water gurgling. (I feel sure there's a fix for it, though.)
customer_reviews.author: Rita Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a busted box. Worked one day and hasn't worked since. I've called customer service multiple times and I've been told they're going to service it, then theyre going to replace it. Been 3 weeks, still nothing. Update. It took almost 6 weeks and they sent me a money card for the purchase price minus taxes. Had to eat that. Bought a GE unit that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Vannatten

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I liked this..and bought another one,but the heat didn't work..it was ez to return but its heavy and having it not work right makes it too risky to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it burned through its compresser cables
customer_reviews.text: After several weeks of operation, refrigerant leaked resulting in degraded/melted insulation and internal electrical fire. Unit fan and electric heat still function, but cooling and heat pump nonfunctional due to burned wires. Apparently contains little internal overload or temperature protection. Packaging seemed designed for pallet loading - when shipped individually metal shell is easily dented.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned citizen

customer_reviews.title: A perfect heat pump
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a 30 year old wall mounted air conditioner with this Fridgidaire. I like that it's a heat pump not just an AC. A added bonus is that it fit neatly into the metal sleeve the old AC sat in. It works great, it looks great, it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Logan

customer_reviews.title: heat pump works great
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 30 year old kenmore with this product. It was a bit more expensive than the plain a/c but I wanted the heat pump, Installed it myself today. Many comments mentioned that it was quiet, but it blows loud as far as I can tell, and it is a fan after all. My old mother likes a warm house, so I expect to use the heater while the temperature sits around 50 degrees this spring. Look forward to the summer with this useful product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS A/C
customer_reviews.text: Once we had a competent carpenter cut and frame the hole thru the wall this was easy to install. Sleeve comes with it ( a little hard to find as it was attached to the A/C) Quite heavy though. Easy to read & operate controls. Nice looking (White). Many features. As far as I could tell this was not made in China. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NJNANCY

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of $415.93 plus cost of installation.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ac unit last December. It has never worked consistently. Hired an electrician to install it. He had a hard time getting it to turn on. Finally got it up and running. Heat worked one night. Summer came. It’s turned on twice in the past 3 months. Had retired electrician/neighbor check it this afternoon. He couldn't figure it out either. He did say that in his 44 years of working as an electrician, Frigidaire was the strangest brand he’d ever dealt with. Sometimes great, sometimes a complete dud. I’m afraid I got one of the duds.
customer_reviews.author: K Ciotti

customer_reviews.title: But it dose do a good job to cool or heat the work shop when ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not have this running all the time to keep it climate control. But it dose do a good job to cool or heat the work shop when i am in there. Normally with in 15 to 20 mins I can feel the unit working at lest the half of of the work shop.. This is at 16 X 32 Ft work shop.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Unit stopped cooling 1 week after installing.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was installed 2 days after delivery. We live in East Texas and are in need of an air conditioner in our new sun room. One week after installation, the unit quit cooling...it was 100 degrees outside. We followed all the instructions in the Frigidaire booklet that came with the unit but nothing worked. We called the number in the book and took it to a Frigidaire repairman in Livingston, TX. This should be under warranty, but the purchase has not been a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for heat
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It keeps shutting off and the heat pump does not blow warm air. I am not sure this unit is not making the area cooler than it was to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: UNIT WORKS WELL AND HAS GOOD COOLING.  WINTER TIME WILL CHECK THE HEATING.
customer_reviews.text: Installed it in a top window at my cabin on the lake that had 3 split A/C's with a tin roof but the heat inside even with the split A/C at max cooling was not sufficent as their ratings were only 9000 BTU each. Hence this window unit was bought and it has made a big, big difference. The cabin is now cool as ever in this summer heat and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Indianrajah

customer_reviews.title: Heater Quit
customer_reviews.text: 15 months after spending over $500 for this, the Heater quit. I called the Warranty number and warranty does not cover the heater. BUT, they gave me a phone number of the only local "approved" repair company. I called them and was told. "we don't work on those anymore". Now what. $500+, 15 months and it's a pile of ____. Thanks for nothing Frigidaire.
customer_reviews.author: Ed and Betsy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t cool anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it on 2017 and the air conditioner won’t cool anymore.
customer_reviews.author: MILTON

customer_reviews.title: Efficient unit with heat and air.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit for a 360 foot square space. The previous unit we had couldn't quite keep up, but this one has been working great. It seems efficient and I really like that it also has heat. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scarpello

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool unit ;)
customer_reviews.text: I could not have asked for better product. It arrived quickly and was super easy to install. I only have two small rooms upstairs and both are cool and pleasant. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have the same model in another room and have always been pleased with it. Had no idea it was available on Amazon- didn't have to load it onto my vehicle; delivered to my home had it installed to a room that really would get hot because of so many windows! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these units for a rental house that has no central HVAC system. They should solve the heating and cooling problems, but they haven't been fully tested yet. They are reasonably quiet and easy to operate. Since they run on 115V, no additional wiring was required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase - Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This unit does a great job in my husbands hobby shop - Heats and cools it.. couldn’t ask for more - It did arrive with a broken fan - but customer service sent part and repair man to fix - excellent service through amazon -
customer_reviews.author: Sillygo

customer_reviews.title: Energy efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This unit easily cools 500 square feet and is energy efficient! Tenant loves it! It was delivered with care!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hiscock

customer_reviews.title: The Ac doesn't get very cold.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product the AC doesn't cool very well. I have to put the ac on 68 degrees and the air feels like 77 degrees. I hate I purchase this product! The heater works great! The AC/heater is very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is great.
customer_reviews.text: Quite operation. We put this unit in a manufactured home at the coast. We are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaB

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: I live in Oklahoma it gets to 100+ In July and August. My shop is 1200 square feet it’s insulated. After installing this unit even on the hottest days I have been able to work all day. It is a little noisy but not bad. I’m very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: Safety and functions.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install Heating system is great for the winter. Air condition excellent for the summer. Quiet no problems. We are using it in our Infant /Toddler room for the daycare center. EXCELLENT PRODUCT GREAT PRICE Swann Road Early Learning Center
customer_reviews.author: ella johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps a small 900 sq foot cabin heated and cooled wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jill huddle

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, shuts off when set temp reached, remote comes with batteries. So far, not too noisy. The owners manual/install booklet should be printed in bigger font. Otherwise, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier. This is the second unit I received from ...
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner is a monster. I couldn't be happier. This is the second unit I received from amazon, the first one was damaged but because of amazons amazing return policy, I was able to easily return the damaged unit. This unit will not run on 110 standard outlets so you will need a 230 volt 2 pole 30 amp service. I have a rancher house and this unit cooled down my entire house in 30 minutes on a 90°F day. I haven't had the chance to use the heater but I'm sure it works fine. I was also impressed with how quiet this unit is especially for being so big. This was well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works to cool and heat the area as advertised. Operates quite as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: swh

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, wrong screws and different remote from what's shown on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The remote is not the same shown in picture and it literally stinks everytime we turn it on it will actually clear the room... We can't even use it it smells so bad also the screws that came with it didn't fit anything I had to buy my own which was not as simple as you may think
customer_reviews.author: Tesha Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job of both heating and cooling and is quiet ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this unit in an art studio I built in backyard. It does a good job of both heating and cooling and is quiet running. It was easy to install and seems to run very efficiently. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LD Oman

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: keeping my 14x65 foot trailer nice and cool. heat feature is an added bonus I did not realize it had this option until it arrived. it replaced an older model I had for 12 years it did not stop working but got moldy.
customer_reviews.author: trixter

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the unit for almost a year and it has gone thru a spring summer fall and now winter. It has been flawless and is very efficient. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I was uncertain about how well this unit would heat ...
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain about how well this unit would heat but last weekend I was able to try it. I am impressed. both ac and heat. I have not used the heat strips yet but it heats the attic room well.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: Works good enough
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we bought this window-mount unit when we needed a slot-in, but we made it work with some slight modification. Not super quiet as I was expecting but definitely quieter than the 2007 unit it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Works perfectly and runs quiet. Like the energy saving mode for night running.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Only one heater setting
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price, easy installation, and the remote for convenience, however the fact that the heating wont go higher then low. That really is an inconvenience. However I'll know next time I purchase another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Myra B.

customer_reviews.title: heat issues
customer_reviews.text: The supplemental heat would not work. I returned the unit
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Michael Stokel

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our chicken coop to offset the very hot summers and very cold winter times. It has a built in thermostat and is very reliable and accurate. It is also quiet. It fits within a small window area and is well balanced. It is a little heavy, but not so heavy it couldn't be installed by my husband alone.
customer_reviews.author: L.  MB

customer_reviews.title: works great but
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 because the back grill is too close to the frame in 1 spot. probably shifted in shipping and it was making a tapping sound while running. everything functioned fine so i stuck a small wood wedge in it and its fine now. wasn't worth complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: john mccann

customer_reviews.title: Not as efficient as I thought but definitely does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for heat what I dislike about the product the remote control does not have the temperature Gage within it
customer_reviews.author: carl pigage

customer_reviews.title: been working great even since it was installed
customer_reviews.text: No problems using it, been working great even since it was installed. The remote is nice to have, but I'm close enough I don't need it. It's in a pretty small room, so cooling and heating up the place happens pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat
customer_reviews.text: The heat does not work at all. Cooling is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Frigidaire Window Unit. It is for an apartment with a loft. The heating and AC are sufficient to keep the apartment either cool or warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonably priced heat/cool unit
customer_reviews.text: We use this heat/cool wndow unit to cool and heat a garage apartment. It does a very good job!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Got the first AC and it was damaged...returned it and got the second and it was damaged too. I'm not very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: TWilson

customer_reviews.title: great a/c
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This a/c units has a ECO mode where it choose if it should be hot or cold. I love that feature. I don't have to change to heater mode.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working / no local repair
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2016. Both heat and a/c worked great for a year and a half then stopped working. Called for repair; nearest repair person was 2 hours away and not really willing to come out, telling us it probably wasn't repairable. Replaced temporarily with a small a/c unit. Now looking for a new a/c unit with heat. Won't purchase a Frigidaire again.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have proper place and wiring available
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it was good we found out we had no wiring or electricity to the only place we could put it We found out today as the electrician just got here to put our small one we bought in
customer_reviews.author: mike stickels

customer_reviews.title: Installed without any problem in a double vertical window that ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed without any problem in a double vertical window that was slightly smaller in the indicated width. Worked as expected. Weak heating function but adequate for California weather.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Cools and heats quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Bought it last summer. Put in my garage. Was concerned it wouldn’t be able to cool down as ceiling is raised and uninsulated. Works like a charm!! Quick cooling within minutes. Plus, heats up during winter just as quick. Perfect unit for my 22’x22’ garage.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Heater works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought in winter. Can easily heat 3-4 rooms, maybe even 5.
customer_reviews.author: L. Charles

customer_reviews.title: It works well. I had to cut a bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I had to cut a bigger hole out in the stucco and make a notch on the holder to fit the case. Other than that it slides out well to clean. The remote is decent. The only con would be inside the blower is connected to a styrofoam vent.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: The economy mode works good too. I would buy this product again if ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in my mom's kitchen and it cools down her kitchen, dining room, Florida room and her office. It is not too loud with noise when you set fan on low. The economy mode works good too. I would buy this product again if I needed too.
customer_reviews.author: Beachcruzr

customer_reviews.title: very good unit. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great, however because it is a heavier unit , BE HOME and inspect it, before accepting. This is not the manufactures issue, it is a shipping issue ! Mine works awesome , however the frame is crooked and bent, I say it has to be from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bowden

customer_reviews.title: It works very well, but is very noisy. ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, but is very noisy. If you don't care about noise but want performance, this is your product. If noise matters, avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: David Stein

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived very quickly, was very easy to install, It has been working perfectly in our wonderful Kentucky weather (hot one minute cold the next in Kentucky) it was just what I needed, would definitely recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte McConaha

customer_reviews.title: Will send another picture of the room when I'm finished
customer_reviews.text: Sunroom cools great haven't needed the heat yet but it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s both AC and heating.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to install. Works perfect for my small office. I ordered a second one to installed in my 12’x22’ storage shed.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: AUXILIARY HEAT AND COOLING FOR STUDY
customer_reviews.text: Great heat pump. adapted to window, installed supports. Working well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it so far does the job.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using in my 10x20 workshop. I'm in the process of insulating the shop. As i insulate the performance of this unit just gets better. Cooling so far. The heat will be tested better soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: but very good on cooling on extremely hot
customer_reviews.text: a little loud on high fan, but very good on cooling on extremely hot days. Purchased a comfortaire for other room. Big mistake as should have bought two of this model
customer_reviews.author: Howman

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install if you have the right tools. Works good
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: ... expected already have two in other applications always had good service
customer_reviews.text: works just as I expected already have two in other applications always had good service
customer_reviews.author: kemosabe4440

customer_reviews.title: Waiting fora resolution ,to new for a honest evaluation .
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was dented through shipping , but unit works very well .The remote is not working properly , I replaced the batteries ,no help ,it needs to be replaced .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm climates!
customer_reviews.text: Unit cools great, basically makes my 1500 square foot shop/mancave feel like a freezer. The only reason I only give it a 4 is during the few really cold days we get here in Central Texas, the heat was basically non-existent. I know it's supplemental heat, but I figured it would at least take some of the edge off. I had it set at 80°F all day and it was freezing cold at 8pm. Still I highly recommend for the A/C and the price.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great unit in hot
customer_reviews.text: Great unit in hot, hot Houston. Really cools sunroom, dining room and kitchen. Quiet for its size. Installation a bit tricky because of the size. It's a larger version of one in the bedroom. Haven't needed the heating feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heating option is terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a unit they could both heat and cool. This unit does a great job and performing both functions.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It was not damaged
customer_reviews.text: It heat and cool. It was hard to get off the housing. But it works good on heat and air.
customer_reviews.author: charles edward  miller

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: I got the not good one. It had 1 side lost screw. The back of the AC look like it had been dropped...im not happy
customer_reviews.author: yen huynh

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation of a product
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage and Fridgidaire is misrepresenting this as a heater. They told me it isn’t intended to heat /work when temps are below 45 degrees. I will never purchase another fridgidaire/electrolux product again
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Item Arrived Broken.
customer_reviews.text: The entire Chassis of this system arrived bent out of shape; preventing any attempt at as proper installation.
customer_reviews.author: Redd Bane

customer_reviews.title: Defective when shipped
customer_reviews.text: Installed ac did not work compressor out Now jumping thru hoops to get my Mother another ac in hot okla heat
customer_reviews.author: DISSATISFIED DAUGHTER

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Working well, but only time will tell if last.
customer_reviews.author: Randel R. Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works great. It’s very heavy. Need two people to install
customer_reviews.author: Brendon hanson

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Product Image
customer_reviews.text: The product is much much larger than the photograph shown. The depth of the product is almost 3 times what appears in the image.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Had a lot of trouble installing because of the special ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of trouble installing because of the special receptacle needed. had to get an electrician to install one. ac works swell.
customer_reviews.author: Maymie A. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Air conditioner will not cool one room
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2018 to cool and heat one room. It stopped cooling June 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Bad heating feature
customer_reviews.text: When cooling works perfectly. On the other hand, when it comes to heating the room the equipment never reaches the desired temperature. The thermometer included in the equipment is not very accurate as I have compared it with several other thermometers in the same room and same locations. Again, cooling is not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Garza

customer_reviews.title: As advertized.
customer_reviews.text: Cools a hot room fast but only goes of briefly once the temperature is reached. Then it cranks back up again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Temporary cooling and heating
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work for a construction project to provide temporary cooling and heating. was perfect size and capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Art Stretton

customer_reviews.title: new a/c unit
customer_reviews.text: for the size I don't think it works that well I took out same type brand a little bit smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garage easily. Have not used the heat yet
customer_reviews.text: Cools my 750 sq. ft. garage easily. Have not used the heat yet.
customer_reviews.author: danny m.

customer_reviews.title: The AC unit is quite and cools my three large ...
customer_reviews.text: The AC unit is quite and cools my three large rooms. I had to up grade my the electrical circuit from the present 20 amp /208 V to a 30 amp /208 V to accommodate the heating function of the AC unit. I am not sure if I wall ever uses the heating function but now I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like my A/C-heat pump very much
customer_reviews.text: Works get as an A/C and have heat in the house on cold mornings saving fuel oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Now that's Cold
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it, cools down the area needed. Timer when needed
customer_reviews.author: Solie

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Not a first rate unit. Not very energy efficient. Compressor only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It did have a dent in the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It did have a dent in the top of it that was not evident in the packaging. But it does not hinder anything.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: It really does the job. Glad I purchased it! Haven't tried the heat yet but I live in Texas..I may never need it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene S.

customer_reviews.title: Heat and Air for sunroom.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sun room and it works great. Was easy to install and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: greatshopper2

product_meta.title: Frigidaire 8,000 BTU Window-Mounted Room Air Conditioner with Supplemental Heat
product_meta.description: With Frigidaire's FFRH0822R1 8,000 BTU 115V Compact Slide-Out Chassis Air Conditioner/Heat Pump you have an easier window installation option. First, install the outer cabinet of the AC in the window and then slide the interior of the air conditioner into place. This unit can also be used for wall installation. Designed for a room up to 350 square feet, this unit gives you both heating and cooling solutions for year round comfort. Quiet operation keeps you comfortable without keeping you awake. Plus, with the 24-hour on/off timer, you can ensure the room will be comfortable when you want it to be without having to worry about running up your utility bills. The built-in timer allows you to preset the unit to turn on and off in half-hour increments. Additional money-saving features include Energy Saver mode and Sleep mode.cooling power:8000
feature_bullets: For a room up to 350 sq. ft. with dehumidification up to 1.5 pints per hour
Exterior dimensios: 22-5/8"W x 23-5/16"D x 15-3/8" H | Window opening: Max. 36"H
Slide-out chasis offers window or wall installation (Window mounting kit included)
Multi-speed electronic controls with 24-hr. on/off timer and full-function remote control
8,000 BTU cooling capacity / 7,000 BTU heat pump / 3,500 BTU supplemental heating capacity
Supplemental Heating Option: With our supplemental heating capability, you can be comfortable no matter regardless of the temperature outside - you have both heating and cooling solutions
Capture dust from the air and keep your air conditioner working efficiently with our easy-to-clean washable filter.
Please refer user manual pg12 for trouble shooting steps
